fields.description:
h3. Description 
PackageApplicationMobileWeb	 
Package the application for distribution on Mobile Web

h3. Steps to reproduce issue 
1. Select the application in Project Explorer or App Explorer. 
2. Choose Deploy > Package - Mobile Web 
3. Select "Create a new Project" and give the project a unique name 
4. Complete the wizard 
5. Find the new project in the workspace 
6. Double-click on the index.html file to open up the main page 
7. Click on the preview button in the header

h3. Expected result 
Opening up the index.html file in that project and clicking the "Preview" button should give a page preview that resembles the intended app.

Test run: http://appcelerator.testlodge.com/projects/1317/test_runs/8365#executed_case_161643
fields.summary: No.97 - Titanium Studio Template Smoke 1018 Mobile Web
